item.title: DIY shrIchUrNam
item.description: If one is interested to prepare Srichurnam on his own, here is the method to prepare it. This method of preparing Srichurnam has been carried forward for generations: Take few pieces of Gundu Manjal/ Turmeric (Not Kasturi Manjal), as shown in the picture above. In this case, lets take 8 pieces of Gundu Manjal One small tumbler(azhaaku) of rice. (8:1 Ratio – Manjal:Rice) Soak both the Manjal and Rice in water for 8 hours After 8 hours, filter out water completely Start crushing it coarsely by using stone (idi kal) or by Mixie.

item.title: shrIchUrNam-kunkumam-lead
item.description: Source: Vijay B (a familiar friend), 2016. Location: Santa Clara CA and India. My son had lead poison from yellow-srichUrNam that was store bought (sent from India). Discovery He was chewing on paint chips on a visit to India. So when we went back I got a preventive lead test done. Came positive. We thought it was the paint. They did a second test in 2-3 weeks and while the number went down, it didn’t go down as much as expected.
